channel.title: plugin on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in plugin on SpiderSoft

item.title: Serialize form to object – jQuery
item.description:
It’s pretty easy to serialise form using jQuery –

$('#formid').serialize();

or by

$('#formid').serializeArray();

But neither of them it’s easy to modify. Really useful snippet – serialise form to object.

item.title: Cut and slice Photoshop files really easy
item.description: This is one if these rare plugins which make my live lot easier. Actually can’t imagine my work without it.  Cut&Slice me  is able to export your assets to different devices in seconds. Whole idea is really simple – name objects, or groups in special way. Click one button – and all assets will be exported in proper file names. It’s getting event better – his plugin is able to export all assets in multiple dimensions (retina images). So… if you ever dreamt about perfect tool for you work – this is it.

item.title: Simple FAQ WordPress plugin
item.description: Simple FAQ gives you ability to create very simple FAQ on your site (questions and answers). You can add question and answer using WordPress panel. Read more on WordPress Simple FAQ plugin page. Installation Unzip the package and upload the Simple FAQ directory into your wp-content/plugins directory of your WordPress installation. Activate the plugin at the plugin from plugins page. Put the short code [display_faq] in your page. Because that is general idea.
